Helper Functions for Profile Data Sets

Source: R/profile.R
fixed.Rd

Helper Functions for Profile Data Sets

fixed(x, pct, index, ...)

# S3 method for default
fixed(x, pct, index, ...)

# S3 method for numeric
fixed(x, pct, index, ...)

# S3 method for factor
fixed(x, pct, index, ...)

# S3 method for character
fixed(x, pct, index, ...)

# S3 method for Date
fixed(x, pct, index, ...)

# S3 method for POSIXct
fixed(x, pct, index, ...)

prof(x, grid, ...)

# S3 method for numeric
prof(x, grid, ...)

# S3 method for factor
prof(x, grid, ...)

# S3 method for character
prof(x, grid, ...)

# S3 method for Date
prof(x, grid, ...)

# S3 method for POSIXct
prof(x, grid, ...)

Arguments

x

A vector
pct, index, ..., grid

Options pass from step_profile()
